activities: This certification applies to the personal information about EEA data subjects that CloudOn collects through the provision and operation of its web and mobile applications.  CloudOn receives, maintains, and processes such personal information for different purposes depending on the particular service being provided, which could include personalizing CloudOn products and services, data analysis, sales and marketing, compliance with legal requirements, protection of CloudOn’s and others’ rights, and generally to provide, operate, and improve its applications and services to users.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Customer, client, user data that CloudOn collects through the provision and operation of its web and mobile applications. The data covered includes manually processed data.
recoursemech: JAMS Safe Harbor Program with a description available here: http://www.jamsadr.com/safeharbor/
